We present three normative scenarios (**Nature for Nature**, **Nature for Society**, and **Nature as Culture**) and one exploratory scenario (**Business as Usual**) of future landscape change in Peru.

Click on the column headers to expand/collapse scenarios and click on row headers to expand/collapse subject areas.
